notes:
Appeared the first time with [[Updates/8.2|Summer Update 2008]]. He is a random spawn with no announcement.

{{JSpoiler|Part of the [[Killing in the Name of... Quest]]. The portal which leads to the boss is upstairs in west tunnel of the deepest floor of [[Cyclopolis]] ({{Mapper Coords|129.227|123.231|14|text=here}}).}}
name: Stonecracker
behaviour: This boss behaves similar to a [[Behemoth]], only with stronger attacks and the ability to heal itself.
location: Stonecracker spawns near the stairs which lead to the [[Behemoth Quest]] room. It's also possible that it spawns after the level 30 door (as shown in the image) with 3 Behemoths. There were rumours at one time that it dropped [[Earthborn Titan Armor]] which appear to be false.
strategy: Fairly easy for a level 80 knight to block.
